The other gem in your training are the shortcuts, I found no other course with the same insights." by Peter Klugsberger, Australia, ex-McKinsey & Co., served various senior roles (CEO, COO) in various companies

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PowerPoint and Excel together make an awesome productivity tool. Management Consultants having great knowledge of these 2 software, creates stunning presentations which are automated, data-driven, beautifully designed and impressive to read.

What would it be like if each and every one of your PowerPoint presentations were stunning and impressed your attendees, co-workers, senior managers or investors without you saying a word yet?

Here's What we got in store for you in this course:

1) There are certain freely available tools that will add edge to your presentation. The section focusses on:

  • IrfanView: A freeware that allows LIVE magnification during a slideshow and that too, very fast
  • FlatIcon: How flat icons can add zing to the boring slides
  • Google recommended colour combinations
  • UnSplash: Free source for HD images (commercially usable)

2) Making existing pictures look attractive using special tricks is what this section focusses on:

  •  Tricks: Layering

3) One of the emerging trends to present maps, products, software screenshots & tables is Magnifier. It helps draw the audience's attention to a specific part of the object or slide. This section focusses on:

  • Creating the Magnifier effect with special tricks
  • Industry examples
4) Emerging best practices - This course will also give you a glimpse of some of the emerging trends in data visualization. E.g.
  • "Topic Tracker" (used by BMW, UN, Tata Group etc.). 
  • Another such technique is "Waterfall Chart" for showing important financial numbers in a Chart form (used by Tata Power, BMW, Bain & Co.).

5) Presenting multiple pictures of different sizes and dry bullet points is a challenge. This section focusses on:

  • Converting multiple pictures in Smart Art in under 5 seconds
  • Converting multiple bullet points in Smart Art in under 5 seconds


We have 12 videos of duration 33 mins. Through practical examples, You'll learn Ninja level application on  PowerPoint: Presentations Pro Secrets.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Your Question - Why should I take this mini-course on PowerPoint?

Our Response - I frequently visit “Investor Relations” section of numerous companies. Every now and then, I come across new trends and techniques. On one such occasion, I stumbled upon an Investor Presentation of a Global Auto major (BMW Jan 2014). I was mesmerized by the look of a certain slide. The picture was able to focus on a specific geographical area and allow more text to be written. I termed this as “Magnifier”. 

Similarly, there are many more such techniques which you ll be able to learn - all at one place. This will help you speed up slide creation and add Punch to your message. Plus, my experience of having presented before 12,000+ professionals in the last 6 years, will help you catch up with secrets of a Pro Presenter.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Your Question – So will I learn All PowerPoint Charts?

Our Response – No. This course covers PowerPoint Presentations Pro Secrets like Using tools to add edge to your presentation, to standardize PowerPoint templates at the Corporate level,
